options.description: The buyer has the option to buy an additional hundred uniforms.

recurrence.description: The duration of this contract and recurrent contracts will not exceed three years.

renewal.description: The contracting authority reserves the right to extend the term for a period or periods of up to 1 year with a maximum of 2 such extensions on the same terms and conditions, subject to the contracting authority's obligations at law.
